full_text: A cute little duck square ! Requirements: a small amount of DK yarn (around 12g - 15g if you are using acrylic DK)……… a plain self-coloured yarn is best (and probably not black or navy). 4mm needles This is Part 3 of an on-going Friday Night Mystery Knit - a new part will be added each Friday Night for the next few weeks. Each square can be used separately, or together as part of a bigger project. Thank you for joining in. Have fun! And have a great weekend. M To get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓
name: Ravelry: Duck Picture Square pattern by marianna mel
